properties.script:
import requests

url = "$activity.definition_activity_02FPVSVC86AQY21lINLs1tsPaOBRHSR41vE.output.parts[0]$/webhooks/$activity.definition_activity_02FPVSUVGDJC72NC2bx34ZPcH1NzBP4KPvn.output.variable_workflow_027P5JFQ0SP106SOaK9zDE4KzgITsplp9Tk$"

querystring = {"api_key":"$activity.definition_activity_02FPVSUVGDJC72NC2bx34ZPcH1NzBP4KPvn.output.variable_workflow_027QB1203EA8L2esNnMu54NvRsQLHdiT14N$"}

payload = $activity.definition_activity_02FPVSUOFZKK51UHjZLXtTqrSiOTg1rS4aq.input.source_array[@].Webhook_Payload$  
headers = {"Content-Type": "$activity.definition_activity_02FPVSUOFZKK51UHjZLXtTqrSiOTg1rS4aq.input.source_array[@].Webhook_Type$"}
response = requests.request("POST", url, json=payload, headers=headers, params=querystring)

print(response.text)
